name: Social Football Rusia 2018
description:
With this application you can:

- Create tournaments to compete with your friends.
- Invite your friends to join your tournaments or join theirs.
- Add points predicting results of matches, scorers and final positions of each group.
- Be up to date with the results of all the matches.
- Compete against players from around the world
- Get information about teams, players and stadiums.
- Know the day and time of all the matches.

If you are a football fan, you must download this application.
